title: Neovim's Future Could Have AI and Brain-Computer Interfaces
author: David Cassel
description: Neovim, a modern refactoring of the Vim text editor, is looking to be the best version of Vim, and also compete with newer editors like VS Code and Zed.
cntitle: Neovim 的未来可能会有 AI 和脑机接口
cndescription: Neovim，Vim文本编辑器的现代重构版本，旨在成为Vim的最佳版本，并与VS Code和Zed等较新的编辑器竞争。
